name: Save the Animals
description:
You work at an internet publishing company that creates viral articles and web posts in hopes of gaining clicks and ad revenue.

Of course, these posts need pictures of cute animals to draw people in. And when the usual system breaks, it's up to you to manually save and sort people's pets under the scrutiny of your Manager.

This game is meant to be short and simple and not very challenging. It was born from a prompt my friend sent to me, being a "social media game where you download baby animals under a time limit". I hope you have fun with it. ^_^
